about_the_game:
In “Escape the Forest,” you choose your path to uncover the mystery behind your neighbors’ sudden disappearance.

Nestled in a remote forest, you and your neighbors have lived in peace. However, recent nights have brought strange feelings and a sense of lurking danger.


Current Features

Discover the truth behind your neighbor’s disappearance in this immersive single-player story.

This arena shooter features designated safe houses where you can rearm using your neighbor’s armory.

Beware of various wildlife that pose a threat as you wander from house to house searching for clues.

Weapons come with different ammo types:
Stun - This ammo type temporarily stops the enemies' movements.
Fire - Set your enemies ablaze which deals damage over time.

Multiplayer- having a blast playing with your friends!

Planned Features


A dynamic weather system affects gameplay visibility and gunplay.

NPCs - provide interaction opportunities, allowing you to purchase gear and weapons from your neighbors.

Nestled in a remote forest, you and your neighbors have lived in peace. However, recent nights have brought strange feelings and a sense of lurking danger.


Current Features

This arena shooter features designated safe houses where you can rearm using your neighbor’s armory.

Beware of various wildlife that pose a threat as you wander from house to house searching for clues.

Weapons come with different ammo types:
Stun - This ammo type temporarily stops the enemies' movements.

Multiplayer- having a blast playing with your friends!

name: Escape The Forest

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2080+
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Can you escape the forest? Experience the isolation of being the last person in the dark woods. Uncover the mysteries of your missing neighbors and discover who or what took them from their homes, all while escaping with your life.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Czech*, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Greek*, Hungarian*, Indonesian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*, Afrikaans*, Albanian*, Amharic*, Armenian*, Assamese*, Azerbaijani*, Bangla*, Basque*, Belarusian*, Bosnian*, Catalan*, Cherokee*, Croatian*, Dari*, Estonian*, Filipino*, Galician*, Georgian*, Gujarati*, Hausa*, Hebrew*, Hindi*, Icelandic*, Igbo*, Irish*, K'iche'*, Kannada*, Kazakh*, Khmer*, Kinyarwanda*, Konkani*, Kyrgyz*, Latvian*, Lithuanian*, Luxembourgish*, Macedonian*, Malay*, Malayalam*, Maltese*, Maori*, Marathi*, Mongolian*, Nepali*, Odia*, Persian*, Punjabi (Gurmukhi)*, Punjabi (Shahmukhi)*, Quechua*, Scots*, Serbian*, Sindhi*, Sinhala*, Slovak*, Slovenian*, Sorani*, Sotho*, Swahili*, Tajik*, Tamil*, Tatar*, Telugu*, Tigrinya*, Tswana*, Turkmen*, Urdu*, Uyghur*, Uzbek*, Valencian*, Welsh*, Wolof*, Xhosa*, Yoruba*, Zulu*
